column4: pidgin isnt inside feisty, you can find feisty packages at getdeb.net
there aren't any officially supported debs however u can try http://www.kalpiknigam.com/blog/2007/05/12/install-pidgin-200-on-ubuntu-feisty-with-all-plugins/
gutsy is still under development, so wait for final release as there i many issues with it
